attributes.action: lower council tax dependent on the services you use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i call on the the serving prime minister to change the council tax rules so that you only pay for the services that you use (with the exemption of the emergance services) i.e that anyone who can prove that they don't use the said service the local council proved. such as don't have children so don't need to pay for schools, not old don't need day care, (examples only) sort of payg

rejection.details: Please can you run a spell-check over your petition and re-submit so that it's easier for people to read and understand.  This will help you garner more signatures.  Thank you.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
